name: NeuroSquad: Slay the Horde - Demo
description:
Assemble your squad and mow down hordes of enemies in this sci-fi Action Roguelite / Horde Survivor game! Build up your attacks modularly, define how each weapon works, and go for overpowered synergies!

NeuroSquad is a Bullet Heaven style Action Roguelite game, inspired by Vampire Survivors, 20 Minutes Till Dawn, and Soulstone Survivors. In this game you summon a group of holographic soldiers who fight alongside you as you control the whole squad. Collect XP to access weapons and weapon mods, and assign them to soldiers. Build up your attacks modularly by choosing which weapon gets which modifications!

Embrace game-breaking synergies!

Wishlist on Steam

This is the demo version of NeuroSquad. Wishlist the full game on Steam, so you get notified when it comes out. Don't miss the launch discount!

Features
  • A variety of different pickups, permanent upgrades, skills, weapons, and characters for a unique experience every time.
  • Weapon customization; Use weapon mods to tailor your arsenal.
  • Optional extra challenges that provide higher difficulty for experienced players.
  • Full controller and keyboard + mouse support.
  • Ultrawide monitor support.
  • Dynamic cyber metal / trance metal soundtrack to slay the horde to.
